texto: 3 Terms, definitions, and abbreviated terms For the purposes of this document, the following terms and definitions apply. ISO, IEC, and IEEE maintain terminology databases for use in standardization at the following addresses: — ISO Online browsing platform: available at https://​w ww​.iso​.org/​obp — IEC Electropedia: available at https://​w ww​.electropedia​.org/​ — IEEE Standards Dictionary Online: available at: https://​dictionary​.ieee​.org/​ NOTE Definitions for other system and software engineering terms can be found in ISO/IEC/IEEE 24765, available at www​.computer​.org/​sevocab. © ISO/IEC 2023 – All rights reserved ﻿ 1 © IEEE 2023 – All rights reserved
